attributes.action: make sure hospitals are kept clean
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prime minister should do some spot checks on hospitals over the country and see how clean there being kept he shouldnt let them know hes turning up just turn up and he will be shocked to see the state of some of our hospitals through being dirty and doctors not washing there hands

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
